issue.title: [C++] Set up AddressSanitizer (ASAN) builds
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-538](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-538). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Certain types of memory access bugs which can be difficult to track down in gdb/valgrind can be diagnosed more easily with ASAN.
